thread.section_title: American Patriot Getaways Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of American Patriot Getaways | patriotgetaways.com
thread.title: Terri
thread.title_full: American Patriot Getaways reviewed by Terri

author: Terri
title: Terri
text: We had a wonderful stay at Mountain Music cabin in early January. We loved that the cabin was still decorated for Christmas. The cabin was equipped with everything you could possibly need. American Patriot Getaways was awesome in letting us in a little early. My only issue was the parking. We had 7 people with 4 cars and there is really only enough room to park 2 cars. Other than that the stay was awesome.
